title: Every Confession Leads to Death - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Childish Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Dead Protagonist   Death   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Forgetful Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Murders   Near-Death Experience   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnation   Secret Crush   Slow Romance   Time Loop   Yandere
author: Lin Yin   林音
description: He Xing's life seems to be stuck in the same day. Her every confession to Jiang YingJing would be rejected, she'd be killed only to be wake up and repeat the same day. She can confess her countless times until he agrees. But it's useless to agree, no matter how much effort she makes, the male god will forget her. DAMN! Which wretch always kills her? He Xing and he are never over?>
